title: 2 super minions per wave?
body: Is this a new thing or a bug? I didn't notice it in the patch notes but there was 2 super minions spawning per wave my last game with 2 inhibs down. Talk about kicking the dog while it's down...

replies.body: pretty sure it happens when the games go for super long or some shit
u sure it wasn't just a wave that was slow pushed so when in finally reached u two waves had merged
